content.raw:
Val can be turned 180 degrees towards the left or right and walk towards the new heading. 
The problem arises when you try to turn beyond the 180 degree limit. For example,
if Val turns to the right 170 degrees and walks forward and you need to correct her heading
to the right by 20 degrees you need to turn to the left by 340 degrees.
It works but it is very inefficient to say the least.
